name: The Strongest Mage Knight of Terra
name_original: The Strongest Mage Knight of Terra
description:
Note: This game is an entry to Studio Blue's RPG Maker MZ jam.

Dane trained for years to be the strongest mage knight after his parents died when he was a kid. He learned just about any type of magic anyone could think of. A decade later he fought in the great war against the Demon Dragon, and defeated it.

Now that a few years have passed Dane decided to just keep guard of the castle. However after his friend Alya is captured by a man Stephen who wants to fight him, every thing changes.

Credits:

Plugins:

A few VisuStilla Core Plugins (Also credited, in the game credits at the end)
